mechanics.condition: Target is a Humanoid AND Target is within range AND Caster can see target AND Target fails a Wisdom saving throw
mechanics.outcome: Target is Paralyzed for the spell's duration

mechanics.trigger: At the end of each of the target's turns
mechanics.condition: Target is currently affected by Hold Person AND Target succeeds on a Wisdom saving throw

description_text: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.
